title: How to Stay Cool in Summer Naturally without Electricity
itunes:title: 7 Old-Fashioned Tips to Stay Cool in the Heat
description: When summer heat blasts and you still need to get the harvest in without air conditioning or a pool, how do you keep a body cool? Here's how to stay cool in summer naturally without electricity using old-fashioned methods and tricks. Grab the resources and the full written post here https://melissaknorris.com/150
